title: DDI person schema
description: JSON-schema representing a person in the DDI model. A human being

firstName.description: a string denoting the given name of a person

midInitial.description: a string denoting the mid initial of a person

lastName.description: a string denoting the family name of a person

fullName.description: a string denoting the full name of a person

email.description: a string denoting an SMTP electronic mail address, contains @ character

affiliation.description: a string or crossreference denoting a legal entity or physical entity corresponding to a business or administration

role.description: roles assumed by a person, defined in an external resource
